duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as the Enterprise Project Manager for the implementation of the ECM system, leading other program PMs to ensure a successful implementation.
Communicate and participate in established governance structures for ECM with executive leadership, DHS program office stakeholders, and HHS DC as required.
Establish plans and activities to onboard and support program offices to the new ECM platform, and to decommission existing systems as onboarding is completed.

education_certification.credential: Four (4) year college degree or equivalent technical study is preferred. Project management professional (PMP) certification through the PMI is preferred.
